001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.log.LogDb;
005import java.util.HashMap;
006import java.util.Map;
007
008/**
009 * Represents a database query with dynamic parameters.
010 *
011 * <p>This class allows the use of placeholders in SQL queries, which can be replaced
012 * with actual values at runtime. It ensures safe and structured query modification.
013 *
014 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
015 */
016public class ParametrizedQuery<T extends Enum<T>> implements DbQuery<T> {
017
018   private final DbQuery<T> original;
019   private final Map<String, Object> params = new HashMap<>();
020
021   /**
022    * Constructs a {@code ParametrizedQuery} based on an existing query.
023    *
024    * @param original The original {@link DbQuery} to parameterize.
025    */
026   public ParametrizedQuery(DbQuery<T> original) {
027      this.original = original;
028   }
029
030   /**
031    * Returns the formatted query string with applied parameters.
032    *
033    * <p>Replaces placeholders in the format {@code {paramName}} with their actual values.
034    *
035    * @return The formatted SQL query.
036    */
037   @Override
038   public String query() {
039      String q = original.query();
040      for (Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : params.entrySet()) {
041         String placeholder = "{" + entry.getKey() + "}";
042         q = q.replace(placeholder, entry.getValue() != null ? entry.getValue().toString() : "null");
043      }
044      return q;
045   }
046
047   /**
048    * Retrieves the database configuration associated with this query.
049    *
050    * @return The {@link DatabaseConfiguration} for this query.
051    */
052   @Override
053   public DatabaseConfiguration config() {
054      return original.config();
055   }
056
057   /**
058    * Retrieves the associated enumeration implementation for the query.
059    *
060    * @return The enum representing the query.
061    */
062   @Override
063   public T enumImpl() {
064      return original.enumImpl();
065   }
066
067   /**
068    * Adds a parameter to the query.
069    *
070    * <p>Creates a new instance with the updated parameters while preserving existing ones.
071    *
072    * @param name  The name of the placeholder parameter.
073    * @param value The value to replace the placeholder.
074    * @return A new {@code ParametrizedQuery} instance with the added parameter.
075    */
076   @Override
077   @SuppressWarnings("java:S1854")
078   public DbQuery<T> withParam(String name, Object value) {
079      LogDb.debug("Adding parameter '{}' with value '{}' to the query.", name, value);
080      ParametrizedQuery<T> copy = new ParametrizedQuery<>(this.original);
081      copy.params.putAll(this.params);
082      copy.params.put(name, value);
083      return copy;
084   }
085
086}
